mapper.select: select * from tbl_product p join code_brand b on p_brand = b_code where s_price >= #{p_value} and p_state = 's01' order by pno desc
select * from tbl_product p join code_brand b on p_brand = b_code where s_price < #{p_value} and p_state = 's01' order by pno desc
select * from tbl_product p, code_brand c where c.b_code = p.p_brand and pno = #{pno}
select count(*) from tbl_bid where pno = #{pno}
select b.bno, b.m_id, b.b_price, b.b_date, c.b_name from tbl_bid b,tbl_product p, code_brand c where b.pno = p.pno and c.b_code = p.p_brand and b.pno = #{pno} order by bno desc
select b.m_id from tbl_bid b, tbl_product p where b.pno = #{pno} and b.pno = p.pno and p.p_state = 's02' and p.p_progress = 'p06' and rownum <=1 order by b.bno desc
select p_until from tbl_product where p_state = 's01'
select pno from tbl_product where p_until = #{time}
